content: create your own kirby plush with a heart for a loved one this pattern uses premier parfait chunky 1 yarn super bulky and a 7 0mm hook for a soft and fluffy look if you love this pattern feel free to give me a follow on social media and tag me in your creations @thewondercrochet 2 1 https //www premieryarns com/products/parfchunky aff=173 2 https //instagram com/thewondercrochet
